class.name: org.n52.sos.ds.hibernate.entities.Offering
class.subselect: SELECT @id:=@id+1 AS offeringId, table_name AS identifier, table_name AS name, 'F' AS hibernateDiscriminator FROM (SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = 'sea' ORDER BY table_name) AS t1, (SELECT @id:=0) AS t2;
